categories: Category:Star Wars Droids: Season of Revolt

nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: Season of Revolt

Star Wars Droids: Season of Revolt is a 4-part series of Dark Horse Comics. Just like Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures and Star Wars Droids: Rebellion, Seasons of Revolt was collected in trade paperback form, however only in the United Kingdom, and published by "Boxtree Ltd". The story was also eventually collected in Omnibus: Droids together with the other two story-arcs and one-shots.
